about.summary: The Oslo context library has helpers to maintain useful information about a request context.

name: oslo.context
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "oslo.context" %}
{% set version = "3.0.2" %}

package:
  name: "{{ name|lower }}"
  version: "{{ version }}"

source:
  url: "https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz"
  sha256: ee05a37829ec797e371a4a25cfebbce42c2ec1bb63ed40028761ff7b83958627

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: python
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv"

requirements:
  host:
    - python >=3.6
    - pbr !=2.1.0,>=2.0.0
    - pip
  run:
    - python >=3.6
    - pbr !=2.1.0,>=2.0.0
    - debtcollector >=1.2.0

test:
  imports:
    - oslo_context

about:
  home: https://docs.openstack.org/oslo.context/latest/
  license: Apache-2.0
  license_family: APACHE
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: The Oslo context library has helpers to maintain useful information about a request context.
  dev_url: https://docs.openstack.org/infra/manual/developers.html

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - tschoonj
